reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: U.S. Technology for Energy Access and Minigrid Development

description.narrative: Support the creation, improvement and sustainability of physical infrastructure, and related services, in both urban and rural areas, to enhance the economic environment and improve economic productivity, including for women. The main infrastructures include energy, including electric power transmission lines and distribution networks, oil/gas terminals, refineries, storage facilities and pipelines; telecom and ICT; and transport, including roads, airports, railways, and ports.

This award supports the creation, improvement and sustainability of physical infrastructure, and related services, in both urban and rural areas, to enhance the economic environment and improve economic productivity, including for women,. More specifically, this award includes a This grant funds technical assistance to support energy access through solar minigrids and provide proof of concept for a U.S.-made digitalized system for minigrid management in Benin. The project is anticipated to generate new renewable energy and provide energy access to thousands of people living in rural communities, creating greater social and economic inclusion and development..

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: The primary goal of U.S. assistance in Benin is to improve the health of Beninese families by reducing the malaria disease burden, improving the health of mothers and young children, and strengthening the overall health system to deliver quality, high impact interventions. Additionally, U.S. assistance helps professionalize Benin's military, which increases its ability to maintain domestic peace and security while contributing to regional stability.

sector.narrative: Electric power transmission and distribution (centralised grids)

usg:treasury-account.usg:main-account: Trade and Development Agency, Funds Appropriated to the President

sector.narrative: Electric power transmission and distribution (centralised grids)
